alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Newport News; Southampton; Suffolk; Surry; Sussex; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 6:39PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Isle of Wight, northeastern Southampton, southeastern York, southeastern Sussex and southeastern Surry Counties, the City of Poquoson, the northeastern City of Suffolk, the City of Hampton and the City of Newport News through 800 PM EDT... At 638 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms centered along a line extending from near Lee Hall to near Sussex. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Rainfall of 1 to 2 inches is possible. Reduced visibilty and minor flooding is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Newport News, Virginia Institute For Marine Sciences, Lee Hall, Denbigh and Fort Eustis around 645 PM EDT. Patrick Henry Field around 650 PM EDT. Seaford, Tabb and Beaconsdale around 700 PM EDT. Hampton around 715 PM EDT. Langley AFB around 720 PM EDT. Buckroe Beach around 740 PM EDT. Grand View around 745 PM EDT. Sedley around 750 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Vicksville, Pons, Carrollton, Lackey, Chippokes State Park, Longview, Oriana, Yale, Lumberton and Chuckatuck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Newport News; Southampton; Suffolk; Surry; Sussex; York
